messages.1000065578:
When #y[Battle Howl/Taunting Howl/Havoc Howl]#w is used, a buff that increases additional damage for all attacks is created. When #y[Charging Howl Howl]#w is used, own HP is recovered for a while.

messages.1000076731: Maelstrom Howl is enhanced. Damage is dealt when energy is exploded.\n#yAdditional Damage {0}%
messages.1000095553:
